name: 真説 神谷右京 ～Untrue～
summary: Events take place between those happening in Ivory Tower and Missing Link. There is no detective story this time. Instead, there is a story of human relations. The client is a girl who had a relative stabbed in the heart. That's the fact that can can no longer be divided between falsehood and truth... "Untrue".
info:
• 平台: ADV
  • 发行日期: 1997-11-28
  • ブランド: Altacia
  • 原画: 宮本 亜李栖
  • シナリオ: 藤堂信昭
